body.raw:
# Curators Guide

## Images

Our algorithm for what image to show by default:

* If `image_curated` => use that
* Else If `logo` => use that
* Else If `homepage` => use that
* Else use placeholder

On the profile page, we show all the images we have i.e. all 3 if we have them.

## Org Metadata sheet
[Org Metadata sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vR4eweMewpzTBb1Dl5xWY-JAjBOqfQH5tiRtkKCTu1uYW373G4WDaZcyPTVaYMVznAWD3cidbKUm2H_/pubhtml?gid=106528583&single=true&widget=true&headers=false)
